posts.post_title: SOLD 1910 Piedmont T206 Eddie Phelps Centered
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this sharp looking T206 Eddie Phelps. Centered. One of the nicest SGC 20 graded cards that you will see.

Shipping: $2.50

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card.

Thanks for looking,

Joe

I'll take it.  PM sent.

Mark
